metadata.Title: CVE-2019-6130 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.Description:
Artifex MuPDF 1.14.0 has a SEGV in the function fz_load_page of thefitz/document.c file, as demonstrated by mutool. This is related topage-number mishandling in cbz/mucbz.c, cbz/muimg.c, and svg/svg-doc.c.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-6130` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

mupdf - 1.14.0+ds1-3
mupdf-tools - 1.14.0+ds1-3
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: mupdf package in esm-apps/focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.14.0+ds1-3').
